text: Roger Côté (December 22, 1939 – July 16, 2020) was a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman. He played 155 games in the World Hockey Association for the Edmonton Oilers and Indianapolis Racers. Côté was born in Belleterre, Quebec. He died on 16 July 2020, aged 80.Regent Cote (Roger) ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec
title: Roger Côté
